desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Press repeatedly or hold <IconNormal /> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

desc.0: While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</ct> is active, press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Launch up to 3 attacks at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Each attack consumes 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct>.
desc.3: Press repeatedly or hold <IconNormal /> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

desc.0: After the 3rd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>'s charged scissor strike, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Reef Rock</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, if Ellen has <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct>, pressing <IconNormal /> will launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.1: This skill consumes 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct>.
desc.2: After use, it can be directly followed up with the 3rd hit of her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: After the 3rd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Reef Rock</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, automatically launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, dealing multiple instances of <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct> to all enemies in a large area ahead. It inflicts additional instances of <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct> against Medium and Large foes.
desc.1: After the skill, Ellen gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</ct> effect.
desc.2: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct> does not affect the branch or form of the original skill.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A rapid dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> is triggered, Ellen gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</ct> effect, reducing the charge time of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, lasting up to 5 seconds or until it triggers.

desc.0: Hold or double-press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: Enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, allowing dashing movement.
desc.2: In the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to control Ellen's direction, and release to stop.
desc.3: Ellen is invulnerable for a brief time after activation.

DashAttackArcticAmbush.name: Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush

desc.0: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Delivers a spinning slash to enemies before opening her scissors for a Swift Scissors strike, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Gain 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> when the Swift Scissors strike hits.
desc.4: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.5: Perform a spinning slash against the enemy, then pull apart the scissors to unleash a Charged Scissor strike, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.6: Gain 3 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> when the Charged Scissor strike hits. If the enemy is <ct color=#98EFF0>Frozen</ct>, it always triggers <ct color=#98EFF0>Shatter</ct>.
desc.7: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging the skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
desc.8: When taking DMG from enemies while the skill is charging, that instance of DMG is nullified, and charging instantly completes.
desc.9: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

params: Swift Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained
Charged Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained

FlashFreeze.name: Flash Freeze
FlashFreeze.desc: When Ellen has <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</ct> effect is activated. Once <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</ct> activates, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</ct> expend <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct>, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>. Ellen can have up to a maximum of 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</ct> is active, press <IconNormal /> during dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Rapidly move through enemies with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Use a quick tail sweep attack in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform a forceful tail whip attack that deals massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Gain 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> upon striking an enemy.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.

desc.0: With enough Energy and after executing <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe</ct>, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Perform a powerful series of slashes ahead that deal massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Gain 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> upon striking an enemy.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm before a powerful scissor strike, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Speedily move through the enemy with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: When the character on the field is launched, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.4: Enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, enabling dashing movement.
desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</ct> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions and release to stop.
desc.6: Character is invulnerable briefly when triggering the skill.
desc.7: Upon triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, Ellen gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</ct> effect, shortening the charging time of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, lasting up to 5s or until it triggers once.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Press repeatedly or hold <IconNormal /> during the attack to extend the skill duration.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>50%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>58.3%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>66.6%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>75%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>83.3%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>91.6%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissor strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, or consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> to activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct>, the skill's CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>100%</ct>.
desc.1: The above effect also applies to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Icy Blade</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Glacial Blade Wave</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct> character or shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Ellen deals <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>, subsequent <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.name: Glacial Omen
1.desc: Upon hitting an enemy with a Swift Scissors strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, the obtained <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct> are increased to 3. Upon hitting an enemy with a Charged Scissors strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct>, the obtained <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct> are increased to 6. For each <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> consumed, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

flavor.0: Chilling winds are an omen of winter, and a signal that Ellen is about to apply for extended leave to hibernate.
flavor.1: Speaking of which, do sharks actually need to hibernate?

2.name: Arctic Ocean Predator
2.desc: The 3rd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</ct> can be directly followed up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</ct>. For each point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</ct> when using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.

flavor.0: Despite being freshly stained with red, the massive shears held by Ellen lacked any trace of warmth.
flavor.1: The icy cold stems from her iron-forged instrument, as well as the fear of facing a predator such as herself.

3.name: Overtime-Intolerant
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: The whole point of "efficiency" is being able to go home early and sleep.
flavor.1: So strike harder and strike faster.

4.name: Endless Hoarfrost
4.desc: Whenever a squad member <ct color=#98EFF0>Freezes</ct> or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</ct> and the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</ct> effect. She also recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.

flavor.0: A relentless assault of piercing cold. Terrifying monstrosities will learn the beauty and cruelty of winter under Ellen's blade.
flavor.1: But, actually, the endless work that maids have during holidays is far more cruel...

5.name: Adequate Sleep
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Except for when in the toughest of battles, Ellen always seems to have that "I can fall asleep at any moment" look.
flavor.1: Many an enemy has met their demise after underestimating Ellen because of it.

6.name: The Feast Begins
6.desc: When Ellen uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</ct>, her PEN Ratio increases by 20% for 6s. She also gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</ct>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. With 3 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</ct>, using a Charged Scissors strike during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</ct> consumes all stacks, increasing the DMG of the current attack by 250%.
6.flavor: An open wound, a drop of blood. A thrilling hunt, a grand feast. A fragile life, a moment of satisfaction.
